1.11.2.1.7.1-pre14: leather strips and rabbit hide, unenchanting now costs XP, more config options
1.11.2.1.7.1-pre13: added ability to uncraft fireworks and tipped arrows, fixed bug with input stack not being cleared after uncrafting
1.11.2.1.7.1-pre11: fixed bug with excluded items config
1.11.2.1.7.1-pre9: added network message to sync config when player joins server
1.11.2.1.7.1-pre8: fixed dupe glitch, fixed shift click into wrong slot
1.11.2.1.7.1-pre5: fixed bug with multiplier not being correctly applied to stacked items
1.11.2.1.7.1-pre4: fixed duplication glitch if player doesn't have enough XP
1.11.2.1.7.1-pre2: new version with lots of new features!
